paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on BRCA2 variants, including clinical significance, penetrance data, and individual records.

individual_records.phenotype_details: rapidly progressive metastatic castrate-resistant prostate cancer
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The patient presented here had a mutation in MSH6, resulting in microsatellite instability and exceptionally high TMB, as well as copy number loss in BRCA2.

functional_data.summary: The BRCA2 loss was likely a carrier of microsatellite instability and unlikely a driver molecular alteration.

variants.additional_notes: The BRCA2 loss was noted in the context of a patient with MSI-high status.
key_quotes: The patient presented here had a mutation in MSH6, resulting in microsatellite instability and exceptionally high TMB, as well as copy number loss in BRCA2.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant information regarding BRCA2 variants was extracted from the main text.
